text: Ia kamaghɨn deragh nɨghnɨgh. God ia ganɨngizir osɨmtɨzir kam, bizir bar aghuir igharagha garibar ia gami. Bizir kamɨn God ia gamizɨ ia uari, uari bagha uan osɨmtɨzim deravɨra bighɨvɨra mɨkɨmasa ia ifonge. Ezɨ God ian naviba fezɨ, ia gumazir arazir kuram gamizimɨn atari. Ezɨ a ia gamizɨ, ia an atiatingi. Ia datɨrɨghɨn mɨghɨgha e gɨnɨghnɨgha, gumazir arazir kuram gamizimɨn arazim akɨrasa pamten ingari. Arazir ia mɨgɨrɨgɨar kam akɨrasava amiba, kamaghɨn akagha ghaze, ia Godɨn damazimɨn osɨmtɨzitam itir puvatɨ.
